html: We can’t access the repository at %REPOGITURL%. Check the repository name and make sure that you have listed the %SYSTEAM% team as a collaborator (use code.seas’s “Manage read access” link).
The %REPOBASE% repository does not appear to have a “master” branch. That branch is required for grading.
The %REPOBASE% repository is too public. Use “Manage read access” to grant the %SYSTEAM% team read access; this should shut down public access.
